Translations.Text: Jiaruo wo lianmin tamen, erqie jiechu tamen suo zao de kunan, tamen bi guzhi hengman, er paihuai yu qitu zhi zhong
Wo que yi yong xingfa chengzhi tamen, dan tamen bu shuncong tamen de zhu, tamen ye budui ta biaoshi qianxun
Zhidao wo dui tamen kaipi yanxing zhi men de shihou, tamen wei ta er huran bian cheng shiwang zhe
Zhu ceng wei nimen chuangzao ermu he xin, nimen de ganxie shi hen shao de
Ta ceng shi nimen zai dadishang fanzhi, nimen yao bei jihe zai ta nali
ta shi si wu sheng, shi shengwu si, zhouye de gengdie you ta zhuchi. Nandao nimen bu liaojie ma
Buran, tamen shuo liao ru guren suo shuo dehua
tamen shuo:“Women si hou, yi bian cheng chen'ai he xiu gu de shihou, nandao women hai biding yao fuhuo ma
Women he women de zuxian, yiqian que yi shouguo zhe zhong jinggaole. Zhe ge zhishi guren de shenhua.”
Ni shuo:“Da di he qizhong de renwu, jiujing shi wei shei suoyou? Ruguo nimen zhidao.”
Tamen yao shuo:“Wei zhenzhu suoyou.” Ni shuo:“Nimen zen bu jide ne?”
Ni shuo:“Shei shi qitian de zhu he weida de baozuo de zhu ne?”
Tamen yao shuo:“Zhenzhu.” Ni shuo:“Na nimen zen bu jingwei ne?”
Ni shuo:“Wanwu de zhuquan, zai shei de zhangwo zhi zhong? Shei neng baohu zhongsheng, er ta ziji bu shou baohu ne? Ruguo nimen zhidao.”
Tamen yao shuo:“Shi zhenzhu.” Ni shuo:“Nimen zenme bei ren mihuo ne?”
Buran, wo yi zhenli zhaoshi tamen, er tamen que shi shuohuang de

Zhenzhu meiyou shouyang renhe erzi, ye meiyou renhe shenling yu ta tongdeng; fouze mei ge shenling bi duzhan tasuo chuangzao zhe, tamen ye bi yousheng lie bai. Zansong zhenzhu, chao hu tamen de miaoshu
zansong quanzhi youming de zhu, chao hu tamen de miaoshu, chao hu tamen suoyong lai pei ta de (yiqie dongxi)
Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Ruguo ni wubi yao shi wo kanjian tamen suo bei jinggao de (xingfa), ──
wo de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao shi wo yu bu yi de minzhong tongguiyujin.”
Wo dique neng shi ni kanjian wo suo jinggao tamen de xingfa
Ni yingdang yidebaoyuan, wo zhidao tamen suo miaoshu de
Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo qiu ni baoyou wo de mian yu zhong emo de youhuo
Wo de zhu a! Wo qiu ni baoyou wo de mian yu tamen de lailin.”
Dengdao siwang jianglin tamen zhong, yidan youren linwei shi, ta cai shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni rang wo fanhui renjian
yexu wo neng jie wo suo yiliu de caichan er xingshan.” Jue buran! Zhe shi ta yiding yao shuo de yiju hua, zai tamen de qianmian, you yige pingzhang, zhidao tamen fuhuo de rizi
Haojiao yi xiang, tamen zhi jian de qinshu guanxi, jiu bu cunzaile, tamen ye buneng huxiang xunwen
Fan shangong de fenliang zhong de, dou shi chenggong de
fan shangong de fenliang qing de, dou shi kuisun de, tamen jiang yong ju huo yu zhi zhong
Huoyan shaozhuo tamen de lian, tamen zai huo yu zhong tong de liezhe zui
Nandao wo de jixiang meiyou dui nimen xuanduguo, er nimen fouren ta ma
Tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women de boming, ceng zhifu women, er women bian cheng mi wu zhe
Women de zhu a! Qiu ni rang women cong huo yu chuqu, ruguo women zaici fanzui, women jiu que shi bu yi zhe.”
Ta shuo:“Nimen zai huo yu zhong yingdang renqitunsheng, buyao dui wo shuohua.”
Congqian, wo de puren zhong you yipai ren chang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women yi xindaole, qiu ni raoshu women, qiu ni lianmin women, ni shi zui lianmin de.”
Dan nimen yi tamen wei xiaobing, zhidao tamen shi nimen wangle jinian wo, changchang chixiao tamen
Jintian wo que yi wei tamen de jianren er baochou tamen, tamen zheng shi chenggong de
Zhu shuo:“Nimen zai da dishang douliule ji nian?”
Tamen shuo:“Women douliule yitian, huozhe buzu yitian; qing ni wen wen neng jisuan nian yue de (tianshen) ba.”
Ta shuo:“Nimen zhi douliule hen shao de nian yue, jiaruo nimen zhidao.”
Nandao nimen yiwei wo zhishi turan di chuangzaole nimen, er nimen bu bei zhao gui wo ma
Zun zai zhenzhu ──zhenshi de junzhu. Chu ta zhi wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Ta shi gaogui de baozuo zhi zhu
Fan zai qidao zhenzhu de tongshi qidao bie de wuji de shenling zhe, ta jiang zai zhu nali shoudao qingsuan, bu xindao zhe bi buneng chenggong
Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni raoshu, qiu ni lianmin, ni shi zui lianmin de.”§
